divs: Sighting Details Not " our first sighting " first was 14 yrs ago, second was 10 yrs and now a few days ago. First was very bright object at 4 AM approx 45% above eastern horizon, visible for a few minutes stationary and then gone. Second was at approx 7.30 PM, winter, saw a semi triangular object ( American ) stealth type shape, with red lights the length of its trailing edge's, flying from south to north at extreme speed , far beyond Mach 10, because of speed was unable to gauge hight or size ( No Sound ) Assuming altitude of at least 20 000 ft ? Friday 5th May 2006 < 9.30 PM as per above description < bright circle, offset in haze, changing colour very rapidly, not like atmospheric effects on normal stars ?
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Johannesburg
There were no other sightings in Johannesburg on or around May 5th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Round very bright object, with haze, changing colour very rapidly.
